name: Dongun Shaper's Touch
text: You create an alchemical residue on your hands that allows you to reshape any nonmagical, unattended object with hardness 19 or less as though it were clay. Objects with hardness 9 or less are like soft clay, allowing you to reshape up to 1 cubic foot per round of effort. Objects with hardness 10 or higher are harder to mold, allowing you to reshape up to 1/4 cubic foot per round. The object retains its new shape for 24 hours before returning to its original shape. This spell does not allow you to reshape a portion of a large object, such as a wall; you must be able to reshape the entire target within the spell’s duration or the spell fizzles and has no effect.
duration_zh: 专注, 至多每等级1轮
text_zh: 你的手中创造出一种化学残留物，它可以让你如粘土一般重塑任何非魔法的、无人看管的物体，其硬度可以达到19或更低。硬度为9或更低的物体就像软粘土，让你每轮能最多重塑1立方英尺的体积。硬度为10或更高的物体更难以成型，让你每轮只能重塑1/4立方英尺的物体。物体能保持新形状24小时，之后就会回到原来的形状。这种法术不允许你重塑一个大型物体的一部分，比如一面墙壁; 你必须能够在法术持续时间内重塑整个目标，否则法术会失败且没有效果。
